message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. I've had great feedback from other customers, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, it's a limited edition item, so I'm not sure when I'll be able to get my hands on another one. What do you think?
I'll take it!

I'm thrilled to offer you this new product! As you know, I've been in the business for a while, and I can confidently say that this one is one of my personal favorites. It's a game-changer, and I think you'll be blown away by its quality. Would you like to take a chance on it for $10000?
I'm not convinced, I'll pass this time.

I'll throw in a premium warranty and dedicated customer support for the next 6 months. Would you like to reconsider for $10000?
Okay, I'll take the deal. I'm willing to give it another shot.

It's a bit of a departure from my usual offerings, but I think you'll find it's a great value. And, as a special offer, I'll give you a 10% discount on this one, making it just $9000.
